libai.fuzzy.sets

Class Singleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • libai.fuzzy.sets.Singleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FuzzySet

    public class Singleton
extends java.lang.Object
implements FuzzySet
    Fuzzy set with only one value not equal to zero. The kernel an the support are the same set, containing one single value.
    Author:
    kronenthaler
